text: Jozias Johannes van Aartsen (born December 25, 1947 in The Hague) is a Dutch politician of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD). He was acting mayor of Amsterdam from December 2017 till July 2018. Previously Van Aartsen was mayor of The Hague, acting queen's commissioner of the Province of Drenthe, a foreign affairs and agricultural minister, an MP, and also VVD political and parliamentary leader. Verwarde advocate reed met opzet Van Aartsen aan, Volkskrant, 4 April 2004.Van Aartsen waarnemend burgemeester in Amsterdam, nos.nl, 2 November 2017. He started his career as a civil servant. Jozias van Aartsen is married with three children. == References == * Bio at Parlement.com Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch civil servants Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Ministers of foreign affairs of the Netherlands Category:Mayors of Amsterdam Category:Mayors of The Hague Category:People's Party for Freedom and Democracy politicians Category:Politicians from The Hague
title: Jozias van Aartsen
